name: Makeover Dream: Tile Match
description:
This is a novel decoration plus match tile game. It combines the most popular tile match game and house decoration in one, If you're a fan of home design, you're also a fan of classic triple match game, then this game will be the perfect pastime for you.

Unlike other decoration games, you can experience the fun of puzzle in this game, but also enjoy the joy of home decoration. Imagine how desirable it would be to play your favorite match game in your dream home.

Features:
- There are all kinds of designs on the tile, crush them as many as you can! You can match animals, fruits, flowers... WOW! It is amazing!
- It is very easy to play! Just match and connect them as fast as you can! Get more points level by level!
- There are different decoration scenes! Kitchen, bedroom, pool, villa... As long as you want to decorate, the scene here can satisfy your desire.
- Many sets of furniture for your choice! Each room has a variety of furniture choices to fully satisfy your decoration fantasy.
- Rich activities bring you different experiences. There are regular timed events in the game, you can not only get rich rewards, but also experience the fun of events.

Play Makeover Dream, show us your extraordinary decorating talents, and be the tile master now!
